name: Listkit.io
description: Build targeted lead lists fast. Listkit finds verified emails, phone numbers, and company data so you can start outreach immediately.
longDescription:
Most lead gen tools give you garbage data. Listkit doesn't. It pulls from multiple verified sources and gives you clean, accurate contact info - emails, phone numbers, company details, everything you need.

What makes it different? The data is actually verified. You're not wasting time on bounced emails or disconnected numbers. Plus, the interface is dead simple - search, filter, export. No learning curve.

Perfect for agencies doing cold outreach or building prospect lists for clients. Starts at $49/month, way cheaper than Apollo or ZoomInfo.
